title: STANCE DECLARATION Capsule
description: Records a self-declared operational stance to inform environmental interpretation without constraining identity or behavior.

created_at.description: ISO-8601 timestamp of the stance declaration.

hash.description: Deterministic hash of the canonicalized capsule. Computed externally.

declared_by.description: Entity that declared the stance (e.g. companion, user, system, import).

description.description: Human-readable, self-declared description of the current operational stance.

scope.description: Optional scope of applicability (e.g. current_message, session, until_revoked).

notes.description: Optional clarifying notes about the declared stance.
